title: LACP PORT CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to configure the link aggregation port 
parameters.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with lacp privileges, and executed by 
operators with lacp privileges.
syntax: > configure link-agg port (port) [ [ no ] passive-lacp ] [ [ no ] short-timeout ] [ no actor-port-prio | actor-port-prio <Lacp::ActorPortPriority> ]

command_parameters.name: [no] passive-lacp
command_parameters.description: set lacp inactive for the actor optional parameter

command_parameters.name: [no] short-timeout
command_parameters.description: short timeout for the lacp protocol optional parameter

command_parameters.name: [no] actor-port-prio
command_parameters.description: port priority for the actor optional parameter with default value: "1" - la aggregate port priority - range: [0...65535]

raw:
help configure link-agg port
LACP PORT CONFIGURATION COMMAND
===============================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure the link aggregation port 
parameters.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with lacp privileges, and executed by 
operators with lacp privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure link-agg port (port) [ [ no ] passive-lacp ] [ [ no ] short-timeout 
] [ no actor-port-prio | actor-port-prio <Lacp::ActorPortPriority> ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "LACP port configuration command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(port)                     interface index of the port

Table "LACP port configuration command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] passive-lacp          set lacp inactive for the actor
                           optional parameter

                           Parameter type: boolean
                           

[no] short-timeout         short timeout for the lacp protocol
                           optional parameter

                           Parameter type: boolean
                           

[no] actor-port-prio       port priority for the actor
                           optional parameter with default value: "1"

                           Parameter type: <Lacp::ActorPortPriority>
                           Format:
                           - la aggregate port priority
                           - range: [0...65535]


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
